context: Charleston is known for its unique culture, which blends traditional Southern U.S., English, French, and West African elements. The downtown peninsula has gained a reputation for its art, music, local cuisine, and fashion. Spoleto Festival USA, held annually in late <a0_0><b5_0>spring<b5_0/><a0_0/>, has become one of the world's major performing arts festivals. It was founded in <a1_0><b6_0>1977<b6_0/><a1_0/> by <a4_0><b8_0>Pulitzer Prize<b8_0/><a4_0/>-winning <a2_0>composer<a2_0/> Gian Carlo Menotti, who sought to establish a counterpart to the <a3_0><b7_0>Festival dei Due Mondi<b7_0/><a3_0/> (the Festival of Two Worlds) in Spoleto, Italy.
